transportAdvice: Savannah's historic district is highly walkable, with most major attractions, squares, and restaurants within easy reach on foot; a local bus system serves the broader city, and taxis as well as ride-hailing options are readily available for trips beyond the historic core.

weather.description: Cool and mild winter days with occasional rain and chilly nights, but rarely freezing.
Slightly warmer than January with a mix of sunny and overcast days and periodic showers.
Spring begins with pleasant warmth, blooming azaleas, and a chance of afternoon showers.
One of the most beautiful months with warm, comfortable temperatures and low rainfall.
Warm and increasingly humid with occasional afternoon thunderstorms becoming more frequent.
Hot and very humid with frequent afternoon thunderstorms typical of the subtropical summer.
The hottest month with intense heat, high humidity, and near-daily afternoon thunderstorms.
Similar to July with oppressive heat and humidity; hurricane season is active this month.
Still hot and humid with a gradual easing of temperatures and continued storm risk.
Autumn brings relief with cooler, drier days and comfortable temperatures ideal for sightseeing.
Mild and pleasant with low humidity and mostly sunny skies, a great time to visit.
Cool winter weather returns with occasional rain; festive holiday atmosphere in the historic district.
